detail_desc: Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Round sunglasses with a decorative metal chain at the top and thin side pieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Satin-covered metal Alice band with a tulle veil and glittery felt letters at the top.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length dress in a fine-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck and short cap sleeves. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and decorative bow at the top. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Shirt in washed cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a loop at the back. Two open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leather belt with an antiqued metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Straight-cut T-shirt in fine-knit cotton and silk in a relaxed fit with slits in the sides.
Leggings in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a text motif down the sleeves. Double-layered, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem that creates a boxy look.
Leggings in jersey with a shimmering pattern. Elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and small embroidery detail on the chest. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a hole pattern. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Suede ankle boots with open toes and covered block heels. Adjustable tab and metal buckle, a zip on the inside and an open section on the outside of the shaft. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative zips at the front and slim legs with seams.

Long hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and diagonal side pockets. Jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Cap in washed, patterned cotton twill with an adjustable buckle at the back.

Long dress in an airy crêpe weave in a narrow cut at the top with thin shoulder straps. Opening with inset lace at the front, an open back with lace sections and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, loose rib knit with dropped shoulders, sleeves that end just above the wrist with sewn-in turn-ups, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Top in waffled jersey with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Small, sturdy handbag in imitation leather with a handle at the top and flap with a metal clasp. Detachable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining.
Sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with a print motif and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a fake fly with decorative buttons.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud, diagonal side pockets with smaller inner pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and an elastic drawstring at the hems. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a zipped chest pocket, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, wide neckline and 3/4-length raglan sleeves.
Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Zipped front pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.

Winter running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at the back and reflective details. Legs with windproof sections, mesh sections at the knees and on the inside, and a zip at the hems. Brushed thermal inside.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.

Boots in grained imitation leather with a sewn-in foldover pile edge at the top, zip in the side and adjustable tab with metal buckle at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.

Shorts in washed cotton denim with a high, pleated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets and open back pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Fitted coat in imitation suede with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.

Set with a top and pair of shorts. Flutter-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short shorts in cotton crêpe jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Fitted lace top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a semi-transparent yoke and sleeves. Partly lined in jersey.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Blouse in a cotton-blend weave with a lace stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin tucks at the top and on the sleeves, buttoned lace cuffs and a flare to the hem.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric with knots at the sides and braiding at the front. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Knitted headband containing some mohair with a wrapover detail at the front.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders with reverse-stitched seams, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, one with a moon-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 38-47 cm.
Canvas boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4 cm.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Two main compartments with zips at the top, one outer compartment with a zip and an adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 17x23 cm.
Flared skirt in tulle with print motifs, a glittery elastic waistband and lining with print motifs that are visible through the tulle.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow straps and small metal rings at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.

Long-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey made from a soft cotton blend. Side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats at the front and gentle gathers at the back. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Sun hat in woven fabric. Lined. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fly with visible buttons, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, open chest pocket and buttons down the front. Rounded hem.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 140x150 cm.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem.
